description: Learn how to make delicious savoury shortbread with herbs and parmesan cheese. These buttery biscuits are great on cheese boards or perfect as gifts.
keywords: Shortbread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Spring,Sesame free,Halal,Oct 2020,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Cracker & savoury biscuit,Peanut free
name: Herb & Parmesan Shortbread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.

Place flour, parmesan, butter, yolk and sage in a food processor and process until a dough forms, adding a little iced water, if necessary. Transfer to a flat surface. Roll and shape dough into an 18cm-long log. Wrap in baking paper and refrigerate for 30 minutes to rest.

Remove log from baking paper. Cut into 7mm-thick slices and arrange on tray. Press 1 herb leaf onto each round and season with salt. Bake for 12 minutes or until lightly golden. Stand for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. Serve or store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 1 week.
